name: File Knight (Night0, Chratis, paper aviator, Kaptain Viciorious, DermottB)
name_original: File Knight (Night0, Chratis, paper aviator, Kaptain Viciorious, DermottB)
description:
You're left in an alien landscape, your job was to protect your alien civilization. That was, until one day an UGO (Unidentified Giant Object) appeared and caused destruction.

You're not sure how to destroy it, and it's too wide to move out of the way. Your only option is to run, you try to attack everything in your path, hoping to buy you some time, but it's too fast.

What was actually happening was not as it seemed, for you were not an alien, but rather a germ, fleeing from a giant nail file.

CONTROLS

WASD / Left stick - Move
Mouse / Right stick - Move camera

Made as a late submission to the Mini Jame Gam #13, with a theme around "Not What It Seems" including a "File" as the special object.
